title: Lynda - Samsung Galaxy Note Tips and Tricks with Dan Gookin
description:
Lynda - Samsung Galaxy Note Tips and Tricks with Dan Gookin 
1h 7m Beginner Sep 17, 2014 | Uploaded in Nov 7, 2014 by 2boweb

Subjects:Business Operating Systems 
Software:Android Galaxy Note Galaxy 


The Galaxy Note has become the blockbuster Android tablet, but there's more to this tablet than meets the eye. This course helps Galaxy Note users like you uncover cool features and hidden gems that will enhance your enjoyment and maybe even your productivity with the Galaxy Note. It includes "magical" S Pen tips, tactics for organizing and using apps, tricks for taking great pictures and videos, and cool customization and configuration tips.
